enWisdom: A praiseworthy character is one of the fruits of intelligence
A refined character is one of the two blessings
The best thing is [good] character
The most honourable distinction is [good] character
The purest of all people in lineage is the best of them in character

Wisdom: أَرْضَى النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَتْ أَخْلَاقُهُ رَضِيَّةً
enWisdom: The most pleased of all people is one whose character is agreeable
The best eminence is [in possessing] a beautiful character

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ [أَفْضَلُ‏] الْأَخْلَاقِ مَا حَمَلَكَ عَلَى الْمَكَارِمِ
enWisdom: The best of morals are those which drive you towards noble deeds

Wisdom: بِشْرُكَ أَوَّلُ بِرِّكَ وَوَعْدُكَ أَوَّلُ عَطَائِكَ
enWisdom: Your cheerfulness is your first righteous act and your promise is your first gift

Wisdom: تَخَيَّرْ لِنَفْسِكَ مِنْ كُلِّ خُلُقٍ أَحْسَنَهُ فَإِنَّ الْخَيْرَ عَادَةٌ
enWisdom: Choose for yourself the best from every character [trait], for indeed virtue is a habit

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ لِلنَّفْسِ وَحُسْنُ الْخَلْقِ لِلْبَدَنِ
enWisdom: Good character is [an embellishment] for the soul and good appearance is [a beautification] for the body
Adopting a good character is the best [means of following the] religion

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْبِشْرِ أَوَّلُ الْعَطَاءِ وَأَسْهَلُ السَّخَاءِ
enWisdom: Being cheerful is the first gift and the easiest [form of] generosity

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْقِسَمِ وَأَحْسَنِ الشِّيَمِ
enWisdom: Good character is from the best allotment and the most virtuous of qualities

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ خَيْرُ قَرِينٍ وَالْعُجْبُ دَاءٌ دَفِينٌ
enWisdom: Good character is the best companion and self-conceit is a hidden ailment
Good character is proof of an honourable ancestry
Good character is one of the two bounties [of Allah]
Good character is the cornerstone of all virtuous acts

Wisdom: رَأْسُ الْإِيمَانِ حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ وَالتَّحَلِّي بِالصِّدْقِ
enWisdom: The foundation of belief is [adopting a] good character and adorning oneself with the truth

Wisdom: لَمْ يَضِقْ شَيْ‏ءٌ مَعَ حُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Nothing gets constricted with good character
It is part of nobleness to have good [and praiseworthy] traits
Good manners are from the [signs of] honourable descent
It is part of nobleness to have good [and praiseworthy] traits

Wisdom: مَا أَعْطَى اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْعَبْدَ شَيْئاً مِنْ خَيْرِ الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ إِلَّا بِحُسْنِ خُلُقِهِ وَحُسْنِ نِيَّتِهِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not give a servant anything from the good of this world or the Hereafter but because of his good character and his good intention
The best distinction is good character
The best trait is [having a] good character
The best [form of] faith is a beautiful character
There is no companion like good character

Wisdom: أَصْلِحِ الْمُسِي‏ءَ بِحُسْنِ فِعَالِكَ وَدُلَّ عَلَى الْخَيْرِ بِجَمِيلِ مَقَالِكَ
enWisdom: Reform the evildoer with your good actions and guide [others] towards good by your beautiful [and kind] words
